{ RAGLAN}
Raglan is small village situated in the heart of the Gwent countryside, midway between Monmouth and Abergavenny and Usk. Dual carriageways connect each of these towns, Raglan being sited near the intersection of the A40 and A449. Raglan has a population of about 2,000 and there are many small villages nearby.There is little industry in the village and so many people commute to the larger towns. There are a few shops including a post office,two supermarkets, a newsagents, a shoe shop, a boutique, a hairdressers,a butcher and an antique shop.There are a number of Inns, a cafe and two garages. There is a Health Centre,Castle,Church,Chapel, Junior & Infants School and Playgroup.
